successes.title: Reaper Miniatures Bones: An Evolution Of Gaming Miniatures
successes.description: Reaper's Bones KickStarter was a project to ramp up the production of the Bones line and get you the game models you want now! You can join our latest Bones Kickstarter here.

Pledges.description: Skeleton Level - Our sincerest thanks to you!
Zombie Level - Forum Badge - You'll be able to sport a Bones Supporter title badge in our website forums to let everyone know how awesome you are!

Ghast Level - Dungeon Pack - Kick off your new campaign by hurling a 36 miniature horde of goblins, kobolds and rats at your unsuspecting players~ USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.
Ghoul Level - Ball Cap - A great way to show everyone in your gaming group that you're a Bones supporter. USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.
Spectre Level - T-Shirt - The perfect attire for the most discerning gaming group! USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.
Wraith Level - Sophie kick-starting her motorcycle - Get your motor running and zoom across your game table in style! USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.

Ghost Level - Urban Legend Sophie kick-starting her motorcycle - It's been so hot here in Texas, Sophie has been cruising around in her birthday suit. USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.
Mummy Level - 1 each of the 30 new Bones miniatures. I see a paint party in someone's future~ USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $5.00 for shipping.

Vampire Level = Zombie Level + Ghast Level + Wraith Level + Mummy Level - (Zombie and Wraith Levels will ship in September 2012. The Ghast amd Mummy Levels are expected to ship in March 2013) USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $25.00 for shipping.
Liche Level - A box set containing all of the prior Reaper Con Sophies - A harem of succubi to call your own! USA and Canada Free Shipping; all other countries please add $10.00 for shipping.

Undertaker Level - A Package deal containing 4 each of 59 different Bones Models, + 3 Wraith levels + racks and signage. - This level is designed so that retail game stores can  participate in this project. USA and Canadian Stores Only. Free Shipping
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Korin the Barbarian model 02798 in green. - You get the original model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid green epoxy. USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + CAV Duelist master model 24564 cast in 4oz of solid silver.. - You get the original master model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid Silver. Take aim at your enemy in style~ USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + CAV Wight master model 24555 cast in 4oz of solid silver. - You get the original master model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid Silver. Now this is how you Bling out your CAV game~ USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Bakarathi model 02965 in green. - You get the original model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid green epoxy. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Unpainted Resin Sophie Trophy - These are the last of these unpainted large resin models. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Dragon Lion model 02788 in green. - You get the original model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid green epoxy. USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + CAV Katana master model 07042 cast in 5oz of solid silver.. - You get the original master model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid Silver. The ultimate model to slice your opponents. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Avatar of Sokar model 14257 in green. - You get the original model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid green epoxy. USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + CAV Rhino master model cast in 7oz of solid silver. - This original master model is a larger version of the production model 24527 in solid Silver. This model has never been on a mold so it's truly a one of a kind! USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + CAV Ogre master model 07034 cast in 7oz of solid silver. - You get the original master model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid Silver. What can we say, putting this on your game table does make a statement. USA only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Custom Reaper Studio paint job - Bring to life any current Reaper Miniature you desire as long as it's less than $30.00 MSRP. Your model will be painted by Martin Jones. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Large 9'x13' custom made Razig Pirate flag. Sail the Seven Seas in grand pirate tradition. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + All New releases of metal miniatures shipped to you throughout the year. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + All New releases of metal miniatures shipped to you throughout the year. Canada only. Free Shipping.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + DYOM (Design Your Own Miniature) - Have your personal player character brought to the game table as a high quality metal miniature. Free shipping including international shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + VIP Guest at Reaper For One Week. See panel to the left for details. You and your guest are responsible for getting to Reaper and the hotel is double occupancy.

Crown Jewel - Vampire Level +  Gauth dragon model 10006 in green. - You get the original model used to make the production tooling. This model is solid green epoxy. The original sculpture of our best selling dragon can now be yours. USA only. Free Shipping.
Crown Jewel - Vampire Level + Special Guest at ReaperCon. You and your guest are responsible for getting to Reaper and the hotel is double occupancy.
